1#pragma once
2#include "PortType.hpp"
3
4#include <QtCore/QPointF>
5#include <QtCore/QRectF>
6#include <iostream>
7namespace QtNodes
8{
9 class ConnectionGeometry
10 {
11 public:
12 ConnectionGeometry();
13
14 public:
15 QPointF const &getEndPoint(PortType portType) const;
16 void setEndPoint(PortType portType, QPointF const &point);
17 void moveEndPoint(PortType portType, QPointF const &offset);
18 QRectF boundingRect() const;
19 std::pair<QPointF, QPointF> pointsC1C2() const;
20 QPointF source() const
21 {
22 return _out;
23 }
24 QPointF sink() const
25 {
26 return _in;
27 }
28 double lineWidth() const
29 {
30 return _lineWidth;
31 }
32 bool hovered() const
33 {
34 return _hovered;
35 }
36 void setHovered(bool hovered)
37 {
38 _hovered = hovered;
39 }
40
41 private:
42 // local object coordinates
43 QPointF _in;
44 QPointF _out;
45 // int _animationPhase;
46 double _lineWidth;
47 bool _hovered;
48 };
49} // namespace QtNodes
